author: Sarah Maunder
title: Man who shot daughter in head will end sentence at home after deemed COVID-19 risk
description: In sentencing remarks, Justice Rita Incerti acknowledges that Rodney Charles Madex, 69, had been in custody since the incident last year and was at a higher risk of contracting coronavirus if he remained in prison.
content:
Posted 
March 26, 2020 19:05:57
A Gippsland man who shot his daughter in the head will finish his sentence at home after a judge found him to be at a greater risk of contracting coronavirus.
